TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MimeTextMatchCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

Docs.summary: Provides a collection of instances of the class. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MimeTextMatch> represents a MIME text pattern for which an HTTP transmission will be searched. For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c). For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Insert(int32 index, class System.Web.Services.Description.MimeTextMatch match) cil managed

Docs.param: The zero-based index at which to insert the match parameter.
The to add to the collection.
Docs.summary: Adds the specified to the at the specified index.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted.
If the `index` parameter is equal to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, the `match` parameter is added to the end of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MimeTextMatchCollection>.
The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(class System.Web.Services.Description.MimeTextMatch match) cil managed

Docs.param: The to remove from the collection.
Docs.summary: Removes the first occurrence of the specified from the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.
The elements that follow the removed `MimeTextMatch` move up to occupy the vacated spot.
